Red Bordeaux

1970 VINTAGE - No one questions the greatness, the future lifespan, or the

harmonious balance of the 1970 vintage, already established as one of the 'greats' of our lifetime. However, every alert wine merchant does question his ability to acquire any of the '70s at all. Only the smallest quantities remain. Should you want any for the future, now is the time to acquire them.
